results.title: Simvastatin Attenuates Hippocampal MMP-9 Expression in the Streptozotocin-Induced Cognitive Impairment
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ prevented the up-regulation of @GENE_MMP9 @GENE_4318 @@@MMP-9@@@ (1.05 +- 0.05 vs. 1.41 +- 0.2, p < 0.05), improved spatial @DISEASE_Memory_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D008569 @@@memory impairment@@@ and attenuated @<m>DISEASE_Carcinoma_Basal_Cell</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002280 @@@hippocampal cell damage@@@.

citations.NLM: Adeli S, Zahmatkesh M, Ansari Dezfouli M. Simvastatin Attenuates Hippocampal MMP-9 Expression in the Streptozotocin-Induced Cognitive Impairment Iran Biomed J. 2019 Jul;23(4):262-71. PMID: 30218997
